name: annieehler.com-strapi
description: My personal website built with Astro with Strapi as the CMS
author: Annie Ehler <annie.ehler.4@gmail.com>

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run --workspace=backend develop" "cd frontend && wait-on http://localhost:1337 && npm run --workspace=frontend dev"
